subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Belmont Stakes
lead_paragraph: For the first time since Affirmed in 1978, a horse swept the Triple Crown races. American Pharoah became the 12th horse to accomplish the feat.
snippet: For the first time since Affirmed in 1978, a horse swept the Triple Crown races. American Pharoah became the 12th horse to accomplish the feat.
